NAME: Shaheen Ansari
ABOUT:
Focused, resilient, meticulous, an optimist and a quick learner; I believe in having a career that empowers me to bring results that matter.
I graduated from Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management, Gwalior (An Institute of National Importance) pursuing my MBA in Business management.
I hold the bachelor's degree in Computer Science engineering and cover up the ideas of data handling and data analytics.
I undertook many Positions of Responsibilities in my institute which allow me to manage a rigorous course load along with extracurricular activities which have honed my ability to take on multiple challenges, creative skills and manage my time effectively. I am also learning Marketing and Management skills that provide me with an opportunity to put my networking and interpersonal skills to good use.

Also I was an Executive member of Student Activity Council at my Institute.
